item.title: Experimental Anchorage SMS Hiking Map Textbot
item.description: TL:DR Text ‘hike’ to 206-202-1933 to get a hiking map sent to your phone.

item.title: Alaska Governors' Wild Ride on Oil Prices
item.description: In 2018, prior to the outset of the new Governor Mike Dunleavy administration, I wanted to see how the oil markets had been for each of Alaska’s governors on a relative basis.

item.title: Alaska 2020 Early Vote Tracker - Rmarkdown report
item.description: **TL:DR, I made an rmarkdown site tracking Alaska’s early and mail vote as ballots arrived each day in October/November 2020.

item.title: AnchorageCovidTesting.org Website
item.description: As part of a test and trace COVID-19 strategy, the Municipality of Anchorage set up a system of ~six COVID-19 testing sites in 2020 to give residents access to free and safe testing.

item.title: 2020 Iditarod Mushers Scratched at the Highest Rate in 40 Years
item.description: The 2020 Iditarod Trail Sled Dog race will be remembered as the year the coronavirus upended the final days of the race and saw checkpoints lock down as the race finished in Nome.

item.title: Alaska Wildfire Growth Animations
item.description: The 2019 fire season has been destructive and long-lasting.

item.description: When March arrives in Alaska, there are two things on everyone’s mind:

item.title: Beltway Billions Data Visualization
item.description: The government spends billions of dollars per year on a dizzying array of gear and specialized services: office furniture, cloud computing, breakfast cereal, and advanced weapons systems are among destinations of taxpayer funds.

item.title: ICE Contracts in Every State

item.title: Gas Hackathon
item.description: I recently took part in Launch Alaska’s Renewable Energy Reverse Hack-a-thon.
